Browse the source code of netbsd/sys/external/bsd/drm2/dist/drm/nouveau/nvkm/subdev/pmu/nouveau_nvkm_subdev_pmu_memx.c

1/* $NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_pmu_memx.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:35 riastradh Exp $ */
2
3#include <sys/cdefs.h>
4__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_pmu_memx.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:35 riastradh Exp $");
5
6#ifndef __NVKM_PMU_MEMX_H__
7#define __NVKM_PMU_MEMX_H__
8#include "priv.h"
9
10struct nvkm_memx {
11 struct nvkm_pmu *pmu;
12 u32 base;
13 u32 size;
14 struct {
15 u32 mthd;
16 u32 size;
17 u32 data[64];
18 } c;
19};
20
21static void
22memx_out(struct nvkm_memx *memx)
23{
24 struct nvkm_device *device = memx->pmu->subdev.device;
25 int i;
26
27 if (memx->c.mthd) {
28 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a1c4, (memx->c.size << 16) | memx->c.mthd);
29 for (i = 0; i < memx->c.size; i++)
30 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a1c4, memx->c.data[i]);
31 memx->c.mthd = 0;
32 memx->c.size = 0;
33 }
34}
35
36static void
37memx_cmd(struct nvkm_memx *memx, u32 mthd, u32 size, u32 data[])
38{
39 if ((memx->c.size + size >= ARRAY_SIZE(memx->c.data)) ||
40 (memx->c.mthd && memx->c.mthd != mthd))
41 memx_out(memx);
42 memcpy(&memx->c.data[memx->c.size], data, size * sizeof(data[0]));
43 memx->c.size += size;
44 memx->c.mthd = mthd;
45}
46
47int
48nvkm_memx_init(struct nvkm_pmu *pmu, struct nvkm_memx **pmemx)
49{
50 struct nvkm_device *device = pmu->subdev.device;
51 struct nvkm_memx *memx;
52 u32 reply[2];
53 int ret;
54
55 ret = nvkm_pmu_send(pmu, reply, PROC_MEMX, MEMX_MSG_INFO,
56 MEMX_INFO_DATA, 0);
57 if (ret)
58 return ret;
59
60 memx = *pmemx = kzalloc(sizeof(*memx), GFP_KERNEL);
61 if (!memx)
62 return -ENOMEM;
63 memx->pmu = pmu;
64 memx->base = reply[0];
65 memx->size = reply[1];
66
67 /* acquire data segment access */
68 do {
69 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a580, 0x00000003);
70 } while (nvkm_rd32(device, 0x10a580) != 0x00000003);
71 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a1c0, 0x01000000 | memx->base);
72 return 0;
73}
74
75int
76nvkm_memx_fini(struct nvkm_memx **pmemx, bool exec)
77{
78 struct nvkm_memx *memx = *pmemx;
79 struct nvkm_pmu *pmu = memx->pmu;
80 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &pmu->subdev;
81 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
82 u32 finish, reply[2];
83
84 /* flush the cache... */
85 memx_out(memx);
86
87 /* release data segment access */
88 finish = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x10a1c0) & 0x00ffffff;
89 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a580, 0x00000000);
90
91 /* call MEMX process to execute the script, and wait for reply */
92 if (exec) {
93 nvkm_pmu_send(pmu, reply, PROC_MEMX, MEMX_MSG_EXEC,
94 memx->base, finish);
95 }
96
97 nvkm_debug(subdev, "Exec took %uns, PMU_IN %08x\n",
98 reply[0], reply[1]);
99 kfree(memx);
100 return 0;
101}
102
103void
104nvkm_memx_wr32(struct nvkm_memx *memx, u32 addr, u32 data)
105{
106 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, "R[%06x] = %08x\n", addr, data);
107 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_WR32, 2, (u32[]){ addr, data });
108}
109
110void
111nvkm_memx_wait(struct nvkm_memx *memx,
112 u32 addr, u32 mask, u32 data, u32 nsec)
113{
114 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, "R[%06x] & %08x == %08x, %d us\n",
115 addr, mask, data, nsec);
116 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_WAIT, 4, (u32[]){ addr, mask, data, nsec });
117 memx_out(memx); /* fuc can't handle multiple */
118}
119
120void
121nvkm_memx_nsec(struct nvkm_memx *memx, u32 nsec)
122{
123 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, " DELAY = %d ns\n", nsec);
124 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_DELAY, 1, (u32[]){ nsec });
125 memx_out(memx); /* fuc can't handle multiple */
126}
127
128void
129nvkm_memx_wait_vblank(struct nvkm_memx *memx)
130{
131 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &memx->pmu->subdev;
132 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
133 u32 heads, x, y, px = 0;
134 int i, head_sync;
135
136 if (device->chipset < 0xd0) {
137 heads = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610050);
138 for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
139 /* Heuristic: sync to head with biggest resolution */
140 if (heads & (2 << (i << 3))) {
141 x = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x610b40 + (0x540 * i));
142 y = (x & 0xffff0000) >> 16;
143 x &= 0x0000ffff;
144 if ((x * y) > px) {
145 px = (x * y);
146 head_sync = i;
147 }
148 }
149 }
150 }
151
152 if (px == 0) {
153 nvkm_debug(subdev, "WAIT VBLANK !NO ACTIVE HEAD\n");
154 return;
155 }
156
157 nvkm_debug(subdev, "WAIT VBLANK HEAD%d\n", head_sync);
158 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_VBLANK, 1, (u32[]){ head_sync });
159 memx_out(memx); /* fuc can't handle multiple */
160}
161
162void
163nvkm_memx_train(struct nvkm_memx *memx)
164{
165 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, " MEM TRAIN\n");
166 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_TRAIN, 0, NULL);
167}
168
169int
170nvkm_memx_train_result(struct nvkm_pmu *pmu, u32 *res, int rsize)
171{
172 struct nvkm_device *device = pmu->subdev.device;
173 u32 reply[2], base, size, i;
174 int ret;
175
176 ret = nvkm_pmu_send(pmu, reply, PROC_MEMX, MEMX_MSG_INFO,
177 MEMX_INFO_TRAIN, 0);
178 if (ret)
179 return ret;
180
181 base = reply[0];
182 size = reply[1] >> 2;
183 if (size > rsize)
184 return -ENOMEM;
185
186 /* read the packet */
187 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x10a1c0, 0x02000000 | base);
188
189 for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
190 res[i] = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x10a1c4);
191
192 return 0;
193}
194
195void
196nvkm_memx_block(struct nvkm_memx *memx)
197{
198 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, " HOST BLOCKED\n");
199 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_ENTER, 0, NULL);
200}
201
202void
203nvkm_memx_unblock(struct nvkm_memx *memx)
204{
205 nvkm_debug(&memx->pmu->subdev, " HOST UNBLOCKED\n");
206 memx_cmd(memx, MEMX_LEAVE, 0, NULL);
207}
208#endif
